developerResponse: {'id': 29331895, 'body': 'Hey there, you can unmatch someone by tapping on their image through the Chat list, then tap on the unmatch button (crossed heart icon). We hope this helps!', 'modified': '2022-04-22T12:42:09Z'}
review: If I have already finished a story with a match, the game should give me option to match with one of the counterparts of the same character. Specially if you introduce a new counterpart and I like him more, it should atleast allow me to unmatch with the original one and match with a different counterpart.
title: Counterparts
